metadata.name: Renamed AdFind Execution
metadata.comment: Detects the use of a renamed Adfind.exe. AdFind continues to be seen across majority of breaches. It is used to domain trust discovery to plan out subsequent steps in the attack chain.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('domainlist')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('trustdmp')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('dcmodes')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('adinfo')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' dclist ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('computer_pwdnotreqd')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('objectcategory=')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-subnets -f')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('name="domain admins"')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-sc u:')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('domainncs')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('dompol')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' oudmp ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('subnetdmp')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('gpodmp')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('fspdmp')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('users_noexpire')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('computers_active')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('computers_pwdnotreqd')) OR contains(lower(process.file.hashes.value), lower('imphash=bca5675746d13a1f246e2da3c2217492')) OR contains(lower(process.file.hashes.value), lower('imphash=53e117a96057eaf19c41380d0e87f1c2')) OR lower(process.file.name) = lower('adfind.exe')) AND NOT endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\adfind.exe')))

output.summary: Detects the use of a renamed Adfind.exe. AdFind continues to be seen across majority of breaches. It is used to domain trust discovery to plan out subsequent steps in the attack chain.
